body:
Im really active on plug.dj and I think I should be "Resident DJ" or something.

Any help?

Thanks
body_tagged:
Im really active on plug.dj and I think I should be "Resident DJ" or something.

Any help?

Thanks
title: How to become Plug.dj staff?

replies.body: As far as I know, only the staff members can obtain the plug.dj ranks (Resident DJ, Bouncer and Manager). Feel free to ask one of the admins for confirmation though.
replies.body_tagged: As far as I know, only the staff members can obtain the plug.dj ranks (Resident DJ, Bouncer and Manager). Feel free to ask one of the admins for confirmation though.

replies.body: Resident DJ was for active users on PlugDJ. But I don't think anyone has the power to give the ranks anymore.
replies.body_tagged: Resident DJ was for active users on PlugDJ. But I don't think anyone has the power to give the ranks anymore.

reply_to.body: As far as I know, only the staff members can obtain the plug.dj ranks (Resident DJ, Bouncer and Manager). Feel free to ask one of the admins for confirmation though.
reply_to.body_tagged: As far as I know, only the staff members can obtain the plug.dj ranks (Resident DJ, Bouncer and Manager). Feel free to ask one of the admins for confirmation though.

replies.body:
I do!
I'm on Plug.DJ quite often, and if I see you on there a lot I'll give you Resident DJ for being active on there.

I do!

I think I would deserve it.

replies.body: So you can just get a rank if you are in the staff?
replies.body_tagged: So you can just get a rank if you are in the staff?

replies.body: So can I get it? xD
replies.body_tagged: So can I get it? xD

replies.body: If you are a mod you have bouncer.
replies.body_tagged: If you are a mod you have bouncer.

replies.body: *If they ask for it, and the senior staff aren't busy or anything.
replies.body_tagged: *If they ask for it, and the senior staff aren't busy or anything.

reply_to.body: If you are a mod you have bouncer.
reply_to.body_tagged: If you are a mod you have bouncer.

replies.body: I thought you dont have to be a mod to be a bouncer :/ Last I checked there was threaf to apply to be a plugDj bouncer and they spefically said they wanted more players to apply and would not longer accept mods.. :3
replies.body_tagged: I thought you dont have to be a mod to be a bouncer :/ Last I checked there was threaf to apply to be a plugDj bouncer and they spefically said they wanted more players to apply and would not longer accept mods.. :3

reply_to.body: *If they ask for it, and the senior staff aren't busy or anything.
reply_to.body_tagged: *If they ask for it, and the senior staff aren't busy or anything.

replies.body: That was the Plug DJ team, not bouncers. We just help run organized weekly events.
replies.body_tagged: That was the Plug DJ team, not bouncers. We just help run organized weekly events.
